Description: Gold ring shaped like a reef-knot, inlaid with lapis lazuli.
Curator's comments: Made on Crete, or by immigrant Cretan craftsmen on Aegina.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (691)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2018 27 Mar-9 Sep, Los Angeles, Getty Centre, Egypt-Greece-Rome: Cultures in Contact
